feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
